Title: Series: Recueil Basan
Description: The Flight into Egypt: a night piece; the Virgin seated on a donkey holding the Christ Child, while St Joseph leads the way towards the left while holding a lantern; posthumous eight state with fine shading added to white areas in the dress of the Virgin, in Joseph's cheek, and pack on donkey; from an edition of the Recueil published by Henri Louis Basan around 1810. 1651 Etching, burin and drypoint
Producer name: Print made by: Henri Louis Basan (workshop re-work)
Curator's comments: For the Rembrandt etching see F,4.103 For comment on the volume, which was published by Henri Louis Basan around 1810, see 1941,0327.11.1
Bibliographic references: New Hollstein (Dutch & Flemish) / The New Hollstein: Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts 1450-1700 (262.VIII) (Rembrandt)
Hind 1923 / A Catalogue of Rembrandt's Etchings; chronologically arranged and completely illustrated (253.VI)
White & Boon 1969 / Rembrandt's Etchings: An Illustrated Critical Catalogue (53.VI)
